page.title: 10GRANADA TV AND MRS ELMY
page.content: My mother Mrs.Elmy is a window dresser In April my mum went to Granada Television in Manchester,where they are making a new series called Albion Market.It is going to be like Coronation Street.In the series there is a wool shop.The programme will be shown on television in September.When she was at the studio my mum saw all the people from Coronation Street they were having lunch in the canteen.My mum also won a window dressing competion .It was run by Wendy Wools and it had to be a baby display.For winning the competion she won Twenty five pounds.
